name: Brain Space
description:
This game was designed to be played as a co-op game so at least one player can play with a BCI (functionality coming soon!)

Player 1: up and down arrows to move

Player 2: space to switch laser attack mode

The focused laser will blast through planets, while the wider laser shot will annihilate asteroids!

See how long you can survive :) 

This game was made in 48 hours for the BCI Game Jam 2021.

Pixel art assets from Helianthus Games (https://helianthus-games.itch.io/) 

Sound effects by GameSupplyGuy (https://gamesupply.itch.io/200-space-sound-effects) 

Music by Three Chain Links 

  • Start screen: Hot Nights in Los Angeles (https://soundcloud.com/beardmont/hot-nights-in-los-angeles) 
  • Game: Drive Fast (https://soundcloud.com/beardmont/three-chain-links-the-5) 
  • End screen:  Missing You (https://soundcloud.com/beardmont/missing-you)
